Package Onlinehandel.entities

Class Item

Object
Onlinehandel.entities.Item
public class Item
extends Object
An item within the Onlinehandel.

An item consists of one or many identical single items with a common description a single item value.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int amount
    The number of single items in this shipping item.
    Defaults to 1.
    private String description
    The common description of the single items in this shipping item.
    private int value
    The value of a single item in this shipping item in EUR cents.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Item​(String description, int amount, int value)
    Constructs an item with specified description, amount, and single item value.
    All numerical values must be greater than zero.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    String toString()
    creates a string representation of this item.
    int totalValue()
    Calculates the total value of this shipping item.
    The total value is calculated as the value of a single item multiplied by the number of single items in this shipping item.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • description

      private String description
      The common description of the single items in this shipping item.

    • amount

      private int amount
      The number of single items in this shipping item.
      Defaults to 1.

    • value

      private int value
      The value of a single item in this shipping item in EUR cents.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item​(String description, int amount, int value)
      Constructs an item with specified description, amount, and single item value.
      All numerical values must be greater than zero. Invalid arguments produce an IllegalArgumentException.
      Parameters:
      description - the common description to set
      amount - the number of single items to set
      value - the value of a single item so set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - for the first invalid argument in the argument list (if any)

  • Method Details

    • totalValue

      public int totalValue()
      Calculates the total value of this shipping item.
      The total value is calculated as the value of a single item multiplied by the number of single items in this shipping item.
      Returns:
      the total value of this shipping item

    • toString

      public String toString()
      creates a string representation of this item.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Hint:
      provided
